banMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
banMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

banMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
banMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
banMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

banMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
banMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

banMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
banMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theDefault:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

banMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
banMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theDefault:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
